CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 23, 1963, pg. 1, reads: "New Minutes Clerk and Family - Shown above are (left to right) Judge Homer S. Brown, friend of the family; Mrs. Alice Scott, sister of the new minutes clerk; Mrs. Williams, wife of the new court official; the appointee; Mrs. Williams, his mother; Andrea Williams, his daughter; Mrs. Edith Johnson, a sister, and Rober E. (Pappy) Williams, brother."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Robert E. "Pappy" Williams, unknown, Alice Williams, Betty Jean Williams, Jake Williams with daughter Andrea Williams, Alice Scott, and Edith Johnson, standing outside of Judge Ellenbogen Common Plea Court Room no. 5 at Allegheny County Courthouse, on event of Jake Williams becoming new Minutes Clerk
